Font Awesome and Markdown, together!####################################For when words aren't enough.-----------------------------.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/bmcorser/fontawesome-markdown.svg?branch=0.2.4 :target: https://travis-ci.org/bmcorser/fontawesome-markdownA Markdown extension that looks for things like ``:fa-coffee:`` and replacesthem with the Font Awesome icon markup.Add ``'fontawesome_markdown'`` to your Markdown call and watch themagic unfold:.. code-block:: python >>> from markdown import Markdown >>> markdown = Markdown(extensions=['fontawesome_markdown'] >>> markdown.convert('i ♥ :fa-coffee:')

i ♥

Don't forget to make the Font Awesome assets available to your DOM, and you're done!
